text: Ihlazo lithiwe wambu phezu kwabo naphi na apho bakhoyo, ngaphandle kwamaxa bephantsi komnqophiso wokhuseleko luka-All창h, nolwabantu; bona bazibizele ingqumbo ka- All창h nentshabalalo ibekwe phezu kwabo. Oku kungenxa yokuba abakholwa kwiiVesi zika-All창h, babulala nabaProfeti ngokungekho lungelweni. Oku kungenxa yokuba basuka bangaMthobeli uAll창h, bagabadela, batsiba imida
